entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is mentioned as being brought in front of the Council of Magical Law to answer charges relating to the activities of the Death Eaters. He is described as smiling awkwardly and admitting to being an idiot.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as someone who was bound by a spell, contrasting with Ludo Bagman's lack of binding.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is described as staring down at Ludo Bagman with an expression of utmost severity and dislike, indicating his disapproval of Bagman's actions.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as a group that Ludo Bagman is accused of being involved with. They are described as having activities that are the subject of charges against Bagman.

entities.name: council of magical law
entities.description: The Council of Magical Law is mentioned as the body that has brought Ludo Bagman in to answer charges. They are described as having heard evidence against Bagman and being about to reach a verdict.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who couldn't believe his ears when he heard that Ludo Bagman was a Death Eater.

relationships.description: Ludo Bagman is accused of being involved with the Death Eaters, indicating a membership relationship.
